data.enText: in the middle between two sizes, amounts, lengths, temperatures, etc.

data.chText: 中型汽车 / 企业；中等城镇
data.enText: a medium-size car/business/town
a man of medium height/build

data.chText: 有三种尺寸——小号、中号和大号。
data.enText: There are three sizes─small, medium and large.
Cook over a medium heat for 15 minutes.
a medium dry white wine

data.chText: 选取中到大个的西红柿。
data.enText: Choose medium to large tomatoes.
media
or
mediums
a way of communicating information, etc. to people
the medium of radio/television
electronic/audio-visual media
Television is the modern medium of communication .

data.chText: T恤衫可以成为一种极好的表达信息的媒介。
data.enText: A T-shirt can be an excellent medium for getting your message across.

data.text: The plural in this meaning is usually media .
此义的复数形式通常为media。

data.enText: something that is used for a particular purpose
English is the medium of instruction (= the language used to teach other subjects) .

data.chText: 录像是一种学习外语的好方法。
data.enText: Video is a good medium for learning a foreign language.

data.chText: （文艺创作中使用的）材料，形式
data.enText: the material or the form that an artist, a writer or a musician uses

data.chText: 绘画 / 诗歌 / 戏剧的媒介
data.enText: the medium of paint/poetry/drama

data.chText: 水彩画是他最喜欢的表现方式。
data.enText: Watercolour is his favourite medium.
a substance that sth exists or grows in or that it travels through
The bacteria were growing in a sugar medium.
mediums
a person who claims to be able to communicate with the spirits of dead people
a/the happy medium
something that is in the middle between two choices or two ways of doing sth

simple_means.memory_skill: med 中间 + ium 部分 → 中间物，媒介

means: (文艺创作中使用的)材料，形式

ex.enText: She is in her early thirties and of average height.
The median age  of that group is 36.

synonyms.bx: 指处于中间位置的或在一组数值中居中的。

ex.enText: This cloth is of medium quality.

ex.chText: 那顶红色的帽子是中号的。
ex.enText: The red cap is of a medium size.
Fry the fish over a medium heat.

synonyms.bx: 通常用于大小、水平、数量等。

synonym.guide: 导航词义：中间的，中等的

data.enText: in the long/short/medium term
used to describe what will happen a long, short, etc. time in the future

data.chText: 发生这样的情况看来可能性不大，起码短期之内应当如此。
data.enText: Such a development seems unlikely, at least in the short term (= it will not happen for quite a long time).
a/the happy medium
something that is in the middle between two choices or two ways of doing sth

tr: an occupation for which you are especially well suited
example: in law he found his true metier

tr: an intervening substance through which signals can travel as a means for communication
a means or instrumentality for storing or communicating information
(usually plural) transmissions that are disseminated widely to the public
someone who serves as an intermediary between the living and the dead
a state that is intermediate between extremes
an intervening substance through which something is achieved
example: the dissolving medium is called a solvent

tr: (bacteriology) a nutrient substance (solid or liquid) that is used to cultivate micro-organisms
(biology) a substance in which specimens are preserved or displayed
a liquid with which pigment is mixed by a painter
(meat) cooked until there is just a little pink meat inside
around the middle of a scale of evaluation

value.boxr_value: The plural of the noun can be either mediums or media for meanings 4 and 5. The form mediums is the plural for meaning 6. 义项4和义项5的复数形式为 mediums 或 media。义项6的复数形式是 mediums。

value.def: If something is of medium size, it is neither large nor small, but approximately half way between the two.

example.ex: A medium dose produces severe nausea within hours...
example.tran: 中等剂量几小时之内会引发严重的恶心。

example.ex: He was of medium height with blond hair and light blue eyes.

value.def: You use medium to describe something which is average in degree or amount, or approximately half way along a scale between two extremes.

example.ex: Foods that contain only medium levels of sodium are bread, cakes, milk, butter and margarine.
example.tran: 含钠量仅为中等水平的食物有面包、蛋糕、牛奶、黄油和人造黄油。
在热度适中的烤架下烹制。

value.def: If something is of a medium colour, it is neither light nor dark, but approximately half way between the two.

example.ex: Andrea has medium brown hair, grey eyes and very pale skin...
example.tran: 安德烈娅有着深浅适中的棕发、灰色的眼睛和十分白皙的皮肤。

example.ex: When violet is added to the medium blue a particularly striking, warm coloration is created.
example.tran: 在中蓝色中加入蓝紫色就形成了一种格外鲜艳夺目的暖色。

value.def: A medium is a way or means of expressing your ideas or of communicating with people.

example.ex: In Sierra Leone, English is used as the medium of instruction for all primary education...
example.tran: 在塞拉利昂，基础教育阶段全部用英语授课。

example.ex: But Artaud was increasingly dissatisfied with film as a medium.
example.tran: 但是阿尔托对电影这种表现方式越来越不满。

value.def: A medium is a substance or material which is used for a particular purpose or in order to produce a particular effect.

example.ex: Blood is the medium in which  oxygen is carried to all parts of the body...
example.tran: 血液是将氧气输送到人体各个部位的媒介。

example.ex: Hyatt has found a way of creating these qualities using the more permanent medium of oil paint.
example.tran: 海厄特已经找到产生这些特性的方法，那就是利用油彩这种更加持久的材料。

value.def: A medium is a person who claims to be able to contact and speak to people who are dead, and to pass messages between them and people who are still alive.
value.tran: (自称能够在死者与生者之间传递信息的)巫师，灵媒

value.def: If you strike or find a happy medium between two extreme and opposite courses of action, you find a sensible way of behaving that is somewhere between the two extremes.

example.ex: I still aim to strike a happy medium between producing football that's worth watching and getting results...
example.tran: 我仍致力于打造这样一种球风——既具观赏性，又能得分，两全其美。

example.ex: It's very difficult to strike a happy medium and make it right for everybody.
example.tran: 找到皆大欢喜的折中办法颇有难度。

trans: 中号的;中型的;中等大小的
多孔介质；孔隙介质；多孔介质模型；多孔性材料；多孔介质内部区域
中频（300千赫～3兆赫）；缩写词为MF
液体培养基；液体介质；液态培养基

partsOfSpeech.dec: im 无 + medi 中间 + ate 有…性质的 → 无中间过程的 → 直接的
inter 在…之间 + medi 中间 + ary 表物 → 中间的物体 → 媒介的
inter 在…之间 + medi 中间 + ate 具有…的 → 中间的
med 中间 + dle → 在中间〔干涉〕→ 干涉
medi 中间 + a → 中间的〔媒介〕→ 新闻媒体
partsOfSpeech.d: 大众传播媒介，新闻媒体

partsOfSpeech.dec: med 中间 + ial …的 → 中间的；平均的
med 中间 + ian …的 → 中央的
medi 中间 + ation 行为，过程，状态，结果 →〔在中间〕调解，斡旋
mediat 调解，斡旋 + or 表人 → 调解人
medi 中间 + ev 时间 + al …的 → 中世纪的
med 中间 + ium 部分 → 中间物，媒介
mid 中间 + air 空气 → 空中
mid 中间 + day 一天 → 一天正中时间 → 正午
mid 中间 + dle → 中间
mid 中间 + field 场地 → （足球场等的）中场；（总称）中场队员
partsOfSpeech.d: （足球场等的）中场；（总称）中场队员

partsOfSpeech.dec: mid 中间 + night 夜晚 → 午夜
mid 中间 + point 点 → 中点；中间点
mid 中间 + st → 中间
mid 中间 + summer 夏天 → 仲夏；夏至
mid 中间 + term 学期 → 中间的；期中的
mid 中间 + way 路 → 中途
